passives.name: Hack the Meat
passives.effects: Dealing damage reduces the target's armor and magic resistance by 3 for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times for a total resistances reduction of 30. Stacks can be applied to each enemy only once every second.

passives.name: Cannibalize
passives.effects: If you or the allied champion on your team score a takedown against an enemy champion, you are both healed for 18% of the taken down target's maximum health.
